description: ORM and LINQ Provider.  Features: Auto Mapping, Generate Classes from Tables, Generate Tables from Classes, Synchronize Classes to Tables, Generic ADO.NET Wrapper, LINQ Provider support for SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, VistaDB, Firebird, SQLite, and Microsoft Access.
releaseNotes: Kellerman Software is proud to announce Version 2.0 of the .NET Data Access Layer.  Major feature; provider for PostgreSQL.  New methods LoadWithChildren, LoadWhere, LoadOne overload with where clause.  New name value parameter support for simpler calling.  Support for special directories for file based databases such as current directory, application data, and my documents.  Record hook events for Before Insert, Before Update, Before Delete, After Insert, After Update, and After Read.  Fix for joining a parent of a child.  A super simple demo is now included. Correction for time not being saved for MS Access.  Added help for connection strings and joins.
summary: ORM and LINQ Provider.  Features: Auto Mapping, Generate Classes from Tables, Generate Tables from Classes, Synchronize Classes to Tables, Generic ADO.NET Wrapper, LINQ Provider support for SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, VistaDB, Firebird, SQLite, and Microsoft Access.
title: Knight .NET Data Access Layer
